name: ProvenPlays.com
tag_list: fantasy, fantasysports, picks, fans, football, basketball, nfl, ncaaf
overview:
ProvenPlays.com is a new type of sports fantasy experience based on tracking, sharing and selling sport fan picks.

ProvenPlays.com builds a competitive network of sport fanatics that enables them to uncover and share their distinct knowledge of sports, players and teams. The site stimulates a social networking environment with its foundation on making picks. User generated picks are submitted with logics and relevant information to define their reasoning behind the selections. The emphasis on the integrity of information drives members to cultivate their reputations and develop followings.

In the end, ProvenPlays.com is focused on becoming the most widely referenced and trusted pro and collegiate pick source and community because of its 100% transparency, reliability and social media experience.

milestones.description: ProvenPlays.com teams with ISGPrime for sports content integration, design and implementation
